column4: I need to install Ubuntu on a PC with no Cd drive so I took out the HDD and put it in another PC. If I install Ubuntu to this HDD and then return it to its original PC would I face any configuration issues?
simple to install Ubuntu to hd with uninstall, use wubi; but that's not what you need I think
you need a tftp server to netboot Ubuntu
wubi is not what I need at all
